name: Cat Deshedding Glove
imageAlt: Silicone deshedding glove with gentle rubber tips for cat grooming
shortDescription: Turn grooming time into bonding time with a gentle deshedding glove your cat will love.
description: Say goodbye to fur-covered furniture and hello to a sleek, happy cat. This deshedding glove mimics the feel of a gentle petting session while efficiently removing loose fur and undercoat. Your cat gets a relaxing massage, and your HDB flat stays fur-free — everyone wins.
features: Soft silicone tips gently remove loose fur without pulling
Fits both left and right hands with adjustable wrist strap
Works on short and long-haired breeds
Easy to clean — fur peels right off the glove
Breathable mesh back keeps your hand cool during grooming
